content.raw:
this change caused some test failures, because I think it wants `PhysicsEngine::SetParam(_key, _value);` to still be called if `_key == "max_step_size"`

* [PhysicsEngines/GzPhysics.Profile/3 from INTEGRATION_gz_physics](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any_dart4-devel-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia_docker/25/testReport/(root)/PhysicsEngines_GzPhysics/Profile_3/)
* [PhysicsEngines/PhysicsEngineTest.PhysicsEngineParam/3 from UNIT_PhysicsEngine_TEST](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any_dart4-devel-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia_docker/25/testReport/(root)/PhysicsEngines_PhysicsEngineTest/PhysicsEngineParam_3/)
content.html:
this change caused some test failures, because I think it wants PhysicsEngine::SetParam(_key, _value); to still be called if _key == "max_step_size"
